Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 22 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act) . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-1118

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Only the members shall select a manager or managers;
A manager may be a member or a nonmember;
If a manager is not selected, all members shall be managers;
Each manager has equal rights in the management and conduct of the association's activities;
All matters relating to the activities shall be decided by its managers, except for matters reserved for approval by members in § 29-1112; and
A difference among managers shall be decided by a majority of the managers.

heading.catch_text: Selection of managers; management rights of managers.
